biotools.summary: PremPS evaluates the effects of single muta-tions on protein stability by calculating thechanges in unfolding Gibbs free energy. It canbe applied to a large number of tasks, in-cluding finding functionally important variants,understanding their molecular mechanismsand protein design. 3D structure of a proteinis required for this method.
